Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I had to disable the treatment of the coinbase as a "specical" transaction in teh daemon ... Now all that happens is the stratum receives the block, and adds the PoW then submits it back to the daemon as received.

Content: I need to make it an option I think rather than a hardcoded change... then I might need some help from either you or @webworker01  to make the pool have a definable parameter to use it.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
For CC chains, using speical coinbases, just set an option to true? the relavent things passed from the pool are:
`{"method":"getblocktemplate","params":[{"capabilities":["coinbasetxn","workid","coinbase/append"]}],"id":1541885661086}`
I think we just need to change capabilities or "mode" to a new mode.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
```
Arguments:
"
            "1. "jsonrequestobject"       (string, optional) A json object in the following spec
"
            "     {
"
            "       "mode":"template"    (string, optional) This must be set to "template" or omitted
"```

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Just add a new param to "mode" to activate the change.
